description: The SUI Validator Performance Metrics Dashboard provides a comprehensive view of the performance and reliability of the SUI validator network. It offers real-time insights into critical metrics, monitors Service Level Objectives (SLOs), and delivers timely alerts to ensure the seamless operation of the validator ecosystem.
